demos.reasoning: To determine which film has the director born later, I first compared the birth dates of the directors of the two films, "A Flame In My Heart" and "Butcher, Baker, Nightmare Maker". I found that William Asher, the director of "Butcher, Baker, Nightmare Maker", was born in 1921, and Alain Tanner, the director of "A Flame In My Heart", was born in 1929. Therefore, Alain Tanner was born later.
